name: nodeos-barebones
author: Jesús Leganés Combarro 'piranna' <piranna@gmail.com>
description: This package will compile both [Node.js](http://nodejs.org) and [Linux kernel](https://www.kernel.org/) using a cross-compiler for the desired target. Used alone, it will generate a Linux image that by default will boots to a Node.js [REPL](http://nodejs.org/api/repl.html) prompt.
